name: You and Dice
description:
Our entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 !  What if an ordinary guy had to roll a die everytime he had to do something, like in DnD ? Manage dice to choose which events to prioritize ! Wanna date your coworker ? Ignite a revolution ? It's NOT up to you ! Praise RNGsus !
  •  15 different endings, each with its own endcard !
  • Fully custom graphics and audio !
  • Writing that's... well, it's not that funny honestly 
  •  DICE !!!!!!!!!!! 

Created by : Soline Carton (Visuals, Music, Scenario) Léonard Champagne (Writing & Scenario, Code) Fabien Vallet (Code, Visuals, Music)

/!\ Could be broken on Windows 11
